title: Number of H-1B visas issued in U.S. , by countries with the most recipients 2011
summary: This bar chart has 11 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Number of visas issued in each Country on the y axis.
Country India has the highest Number of visas issued and Germany has the lowest Number of visas issued.
The highest Country India has 70811.0 more Number of visas issued than the lowest Country Germany.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Number of visas issued in the y axis.
The Number of visas issued is highest at Country India and lowest at Country Germany.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 11 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Number of visas issued in each Country on the y axis.
Country India has the highest Number of visas issued and Germany has the lowest Number of visas issued.
The highest Country India has 70811.0 more Number of visas issued than the lowest Country Germany.
max_summary: This bar chart has 11 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Number of visas issued in each Country on the y axis.
The Number of visas issued is appeared to be the highest at Country India and lowest at Country Germany.
The second highest Number of visas issued is appeared to be the Country Other.
The highest Country India has 70811.0 more Number of visas issued than the lowest Country Germany.
Country India is higher than any other Countrys with value 72438.0, followed by Other, and China-mainland. Down to Country Germany with the lowest value 1627.0.
Considered together, the average Number of visas issued in all 11 Countrys is roughly 11739.45.
Summing up the values of all Countrys, we get total 129134.0.
